entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
